item.title: Foundations Race to Save Vaccine Progress
item.description: With funding cuts threatening global immunization, philanthropic organizations are stepping up but warn they can’t fill the gap alone. Medscape Medica...

item.title: Republicans Muscle Trump's Sweeping Tax Cut, Spending Bill
item.description: Congressional Republicans pass controversial budget bill that dramatically slashes Medicaid and other social service programs. Reuters Health Informat...

item.title: Study: Rx Delayed in Half of US Children With Vitiligo
item.description: Only half of pediatric patients with vitiligo receive treatment within 2 years of diagnosis, a US study reports. Medscape Medical News

item.title: MHRA Approves New Immunotherapy for Bladder Cancer
item.description: The MHRA has approved a new immunotherapy for BCG-unresponsive bladder cancer, offering a bladder-sparing alternative to cystectomy. Medscape News UK

item.title: ‘Gold Card’ Programs to Reduce Prior Auth ‘Underwhelming’
